frame.name: Confronting_problem
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> becomes involved in an <fen>Issue</fen> which has negative consequences for them. The <fen>Agent</fen> will normally respond to resolve the <fen>Issue</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>confronted</t> <fex name="Issue">both issues</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Issue
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Issue</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> deals with.</def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the person who is acting to deal with the <fen>Issue</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the intentional act occurs.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the reason why the <fen>Agent</fen> confronts the issue. </def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the time when the Agent acts intentionally.</def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the way in which an <fen>Agent</fen> goes about facing the <fen>Issue</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>).
</def-root>

FE.name: Frequency
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Frequency</fen> with which the <fen>Agent</fen> does the <fen>Act</fen> in a given period of time.</def-root>

FE.name: Period_of_iterations
FE.definition: <def-root>The length of time from when the event denoted by the target began to be repeated to when it stopped.</def-root>

FE.name: Result
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Result</fen> describes the resulting outcome of the confronting act.</def-root>

FE.name: Particular_iteration
FE.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the Explanation causes the state of affairs expressed by the target, but not in all cases. </def-root>

FE.name: Event_description
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE gives a description of the confronting event as a whole.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: face.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: put oneself in the position to understand and being dealing with something unpleasant.

lexUnit.name: confront.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: begin to try to handle a problem
